name: Farming Simulator 3019
description:
Farming Simulator 3019 was made for the 9 Day Jam #6... But instead of 9 days I only had time for 1-2 days.

My main reason to joining the Jam wasn't to make a game but instead to make a game for my game engine I am working on to find bugs and see what I need to improve on for the future.

Thanks for playing!
